event: Sir Charles Baskerville found dead at Baskerville Hall gates. Apparent heart attack.
Dr. Mortimer reports strange footprints near the body.
Sir Henry Baskerville arrives in London from Canada.
Anonymous warning letter sent to Sir Henry at hotel.
Sir Henry and Dr. Watson travel to Baskerville Hall.
Watson observes Barrymore signaling with a candle late at night.
Seldon (escaped convict) found dead on the moor, mistaken identity.
Holmes reveals Stapleton's identity and motive. Stapleton flees.
